com.leonovich.cofeebreak.service

Class CoffeeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leonovich.cofeebreak.service.CoffeeService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICoffeeService

    @Service(value="coffeeService")
@Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED,
               readOnly=false)
public class CoffeeService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICoffeeService
    Service class, for do operations with Coffee entity on Service layer In this class entity convert to DTO object Created by alexanderleonovich on 16.08.15.
